website_summaries.verdict: Two nice-looking smaller lamps with touch activation at a low price.
pros: These little lamps look great on a bookshelf, dresser, or bedside
For their size, they put out a lot of light and have four-brightness touch functionality
Each lamp measures 9.2 inches in height
cons: These lamps are very tiny and may not be big enough

customer_reviews.title: These little guys are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They may be small, but fill the room with light. Perfect small nightstand lamps I was looking for. I love that you don't have to fumble around trying to find the switch;just tap the bottom and you have your choice of lighting (mood, don't wanna trip going to the bathroom, and reading.). I'd recommend for anyone on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Little Lamps That Can
customer_reviews.text: While you may be able to read at the brightest level, these lamps are mainly decorative/ambient, which is the only reason I purchased them. They are super light, very sensitive but absolutely fantastic and they work just fine. I just had to convince my 4-year-old who is fascinated by the touch-activation that they are not toys. Three settings are in the pictures. For the price, Nothing really can't beat this duo. If you are looking for reading lights, something sturdy that you would be turning on and off often, these may not be for you, otherwise, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: KHP

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with mine
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with mine. It's been a few months and they still work. Had issues at first but they were replaced quickly. Just make sure you use the correct bulbs for them to work properly, no more than 30 watts. They are small obviously and you won't be disappointed if you pay attention to the description.
customer_reviews.author: Cherno

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why some people are complaining about the small size. I think it's great that they are not that big. The design is simple, but not too cheap. The setup was super easy. The touch control just works. Just the dimming levels could be a little more defined. I used 6W IKEA bulbs and I can tell you with two of these on our nightstands we do not need any other lighting in our bedroom. Bottom line: Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: kesslerIO

customer_reviews.title: Had to unplug it which was annoying.
customer_reviews.text: It's true that they're very small, but you're also getting two lamps for a very low price. I didn't think I'd mind but touching them pushes them around my nightstand. There's only one brightness and that's BRIGHT. Biggest problem : they won't turn off anymore. They worked for about 10 minutes then the light stopped switching off. I tapped the lamp multiple times in different spots to make sure I wasn't doing it wrong. Still won't shut off. Had to unplug it which was annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W

customer_reviews.title: I found it pretty difficult to find a table lamp I liked
customer_reviews.text: Very cute mini lamps used for a night stand. Before buying these ones, I found it pretty difficult to find a table lamp I liked... Half of them looked like pepper mills and the other half looked like a sex toy. I especially like the shape/proportion of them; they have a longer shade just like the picture. And of course, the touch control is convenient as heck. I am giving it only 4 stars because the screw on piece that connects bulb to the base was chipped off upon arrival. Bought the bulbs that Amazon recommended, and I am impressed with the quality and brightness (I.e., low, med, high, off).
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea P.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: These little lamps are a perfect addition to my room decor and are bright enough to light up an average-sized (or even larger) room. I also love that they have a touch feature instead of the on/off switch connected to the cord as most others do. The recommended bulbs for these lamps are E12 40 watt bulbs. I'm currently using 25 watt frosted bulbs in these now, but I find them to be too bright even on the lowest setting. Will be swapping them out to a lower wattage to get my desired effect.
customer_reviews.author: MzzKeni

customer_reviews.title: Very cool lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect bedside lamp. Besides the touch-to-turn-on feature being super cool, it's incredibly convenient that you don't have to fumble in the dark to find the switch. The lamp is small so it fits comfortably on our bedside table. I love having the choice of different brightness levels. The dim light setting is perfect when you wake up in the middle of the night, and the brightest setting easily lights up the whole room. We're only using one lamp currently, but I'm glad to have a backup just in case. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: louisa

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Got this a second time. The first one I bought both lamps were not working. Then I exchanged it and these work fine. What I don’t like about them is the fact you can’t use energy saving bulbs in them unfortunately. Besides that these are really convenient and doesn’t take up that much room.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed A Wajiuddin

customer_reviews.title: Damanged bases
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on prime days, because these are the perfect size and style for my guest bedroom. I loved the touch feature, and the lamps would have been perfect if they weren't scratched up from shipping. The manufacturer placed a thin plastic bag around the base and wrapped the cords around the base. The cords rubbed on the stainless steel and left scratch marks on both bases. I ordered a replacement set, same problem. I believe this could be changed if you wrapped the bases in bubble wrap. I am disappointed, but the lamps worked great when I tried them. Wish I could have kept them!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: One Light Stopped Working - Only Used Twice
customer_reviews.text: These lamps were just perfect for my little guest bedroom until one of the lamps stopped working. It is stuck in the ON position, and I can't touch it OFF. I changed out the light bulb, but it didn't help. Now, I have one that works perfect and a second one that I can't use. In addition, I can't find a way to contact the seller to see if we can swap it out. It's very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Revelle

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 chance they work correctly
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 2 pack and one of them works great but the other is flawed and flickers at the brightest setting. I love the way they look, like that they are touch activated and have the low to bright light setting. If only both could have worked correctly! :(
customer_reviews.author: janelia ayala

customer_reviews.title: These lamps are junk!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had them less than 2 months and one is already broken. It won’t turn on at all and current is running through the base. I know I can’t get a replacement but the lamps should have lasted longer than 2 months with light use! The lamp only gets turned on once or twice a week! Oh and the shades on both came crooked and there’s no way to make them straight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but fragile...
customer_reviews.text: I love these little lamps, but they are quite small and lightweight. Due to how feather-light they are, they tip over very easily. My husband bumped his nightstand slightly and the lamp tumbled to the floor. The small fall caused a crack in the lampshade and the touch feature hasn't worked since.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps for nightstands or baby's room
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set 4 years ago before our daughter was born. I put one in the nursery and one on my nightstand. The dimmest setting was perfect to be able to find our way around her room for nighttime feedings and now serves as a nightlight for her. It has basically been on for 4 years and is still going. We have replaced the lightbulbs once, but that is it. The second lamp is on my nightstand and it's a great option to have some reading light without getting out of bed to turn on the light. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Perez

customer_reviews.title: 4 yrs old
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. Still going after 4 years. The dimmer switch in one lamp went out and I replaced it for $1.83. Ebay: 110V 3Way Light Sensor Switch Control for Lamp Desk Bulb Dimmer Repair Kit.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great little nightstand lamps
customer_reviews.text: Loved these so much. Both lasted about 1 week. 1 week in the light bulb blew on one of these and it broke the whole lamp. The whole lamp short circuited. Very disappointing. I'm still giving it 4 stars because the 1 I still have is awesome. It's on my nightstand the first touch of the lamp is a very dim light perfect for when you want some light while your partner is sleeping. When you hit it on the third time it lights the room up pretty brightly even though there is only a 40 watt bulb in there.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, distinctive settings, good price, modern touch.
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are small, but they are wonderful. The three touch settings are very distinct and it is perfect. The low setting is just bright enough to read or watch tv, but still dim enough for someone to sleep, so it works well to have one on each side of the bed. The lamps are built well and were able to withstand my cat knocking it off the night stand within hours of being out of the box, with absolutely no damage to the lamp. These lamps add a sense of style to the room, and i recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love these little lamps!
customer_reviews.text: When I got them, I thought these lamps were way too little to give off any kind of substantial light. But with LED bulbs, they're awesome. The dim light is great for right before bed. And the brighter settings are plenty bright. Two lamps light up my entire large bedroom well. They are very simple and stylish. I'm going to buy more for my other bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Siege

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are just so small though. We use ours by the bedside and works out fine. Touch base for 3 different brightness levels.
customer_reviews.author: pwsfirewoman

customer_reviews.title: NIce Lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps, though small, take up little space on a bedside table and generate a lot of light in 3 increments. I no longer fear falling out of bed trying to turn off the lights on my previous lamps which were much taller. They were well packaged and arrived in a timely fashion. I ordered the bulbs that were suggested and they do a more than adequate job.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Reid

customer_reviews.title: These are cute little lamps. I wish they were ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute little lamps. I wish they were a little brighter, but they are definitely enough to see across the bedroom and get in or out of bed without my glasses on, so they serve the purpose that I wanted them for. I personally don't think they are bright enough to read by at night, so need an additional light for that. The touch control does work very well. I was a little worried that my cats might turn them on during the day, but so far that has not happened.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Hunnefield

customer_reviews.title: Bright, cute, easy to use & compact!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was looking for! I know one reviewer showed a melted shade overnight, but i didn’t experience that. I got them yesterday and turned them on for a few hours before bed and neither shade felt warm in that amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love these little lamps
customer_reviews.text: Love these little lamps. They are perfect when you need to turn the light on and don't want to fumble for a switch in the dark when you're sleepy and groggy! They are quite small, but perfect when you have a small night stand. They have three settings. I love the low setting for when I'm not quite ready to sleep but don't want to bother others. :)
customer_reviews.author: BJR

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price! Pretty but Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Good lamp for my toddler’s dresser. Modern, sleek lamp for a good price. Used one for about a year and a half and it stopped working. Took the second one out of the box and it only lasted about 9 months. Ok for a bargain, but don’t expect them to last long-term.
customer_reviews.author: ATL Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome! Yes, they are TINY! However, they can light up a room with the right amount of ambiance as a pair. I set them on either side of the bed on the nightstands...they look pretty small..but for the price- can't beat it. Plus, they make the room look nice when lit. For decor on a budget, these are the sweet spot! They might also look nice in Ikea Expedit shelves, too.
customer_reviews.author: FluffyEskimo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little lamps
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little lamps. They come as a pack of two and work great to use on the nightstand by the bed. They offer three levels of light and the brightest is enough to read by. They are really small, but easy to assemble and work great so far. My wife and I really liked the modern design of them. It's a great deal for the price if you're looking for an inexpensive lamp and don't have a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Lisa Miller

customer_reviews.title: amazing little lamps
customer_reviews.text: Lamps arrived nicely packaged. OMG they are SO cute!!! Easy assemble. I love the touch feature. There are four settings. Very modern and chic style. goes with every thing. I was little surprised by the size of the lamp, thinking it will not be bright as i want. But works perfectly. If both lamps are on at the brightest setting, the rooms is well lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo Duchess

customer_reviews.title: ... on her night stand that she could turn off nice & easy
customer_reviews.text: I just got these so my 84 year old mom would have something on her night stand that she could turn off nice & easy. Anyway these arrived safely the other day and they seem to be working just as I'd hoped they would. I didn't know this when I purchased them but I like the fact that these lights have 3 "levels" of illumination. In my mom's room the lowest level works great as a night light and the highest level provides her with enough light to read.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy L.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased LED bulbs for these and they are very bright even on the lowest setting. They both work as advertised with just a light touch on the base and don't take up very much space on the night stand. They won't work with a lot of décor themes, but they work well for us.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. O. Neal

customer_reviews.title: They were a little smaller than I expected, but ...
customer_reviews.text: They were a little smaller than I expected, but they work well. For the dimming, it goes from very dim, to medium, to the brightest. Sometimes on the dimmest one, the light flickers a little. I do wish there was a way that it would go from the brightest back down to dim. It's blinding when you have it on dim to read and then have to go all the way up to the brightest to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a little under a year ago. Last week I had it plugged in but not on and left for 2 hours. When I got home my whole house smelt of burning plastic and it was on, by itself(in the middle of the day), and had caught on fire. Do not buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Small and Bright
customer_reviews.text: I wanted small and clean looking lamps to put in a corner and to fit on my (future) bookcase. These little guys were perfect. They are small but don't underestimate their brightness. They have three touch settings so you can choose your light type. I like the brushed brass look. I only wish the cords were white or clear so I could hide them better. Great purchase though!
customer_reviews.author: Torjer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE LAMPS. I have ordered two ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE LAMPS. I have ordered two sets of these lamps, and three out of four no longer work after a month of light usage. The first set of lamps worked perfectly for about a month, but later stopped working after continued usage. I sent them for replacement, and sadly the new lamps fell victim to the same fate after several weeks. Do yourself a favor and save the head ache. Spend a bit more to get lamps that actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, but works. A little small for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Tiny, but works. A little small for a bedside lamp. What I mean is that it's a small target to hit in the dark if you have to get up in the middle of the night. Half asleep, you have to somehow be able to hit the 2" target to turn it on. I've knocked it to the floor a couple of times already. I may have to mod it to make it a more usable product.
customer_reviews.author: eh

customer_reviews.title: Great style and function, but a bit glitchy.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the style of these. They are a bit small, but look great with modern or traditional furniture. Also the 3 levels of brightness are a great feature. Two stars off due to the fact that one of the lights randomly turns on in the middle of the night, which makes it useless for us in our bedroom. This is probably a glitch with the sensor, so we keep that one in a guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Works well with LED Dimmable Light Bulb
customer_reviews.text: Casts a nice 3-way adjustable light. We have them on our nightstands and they're small enough they don't take up much space. Works well with Philips LED Dimmable B12 Soft White Light Bulb.
customer_reviews.author: mrsball3

customer_reviews.title: Nice small touch lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I like these little touch lights with 3 settings. They are perfect for a foyer or hallway or stairwell. I use one for a night light. I use with the energy efficient candelabra bulbs so I believe the electric used is minimal. Great price for these and packaged nicely. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cxw

customer_reviews.title: Love these little lamps!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps - they are a great addition to our guest room. We have small side tables so needed something small to not make these tables useless. The lamps fit perfectly, provide adequate lighting, and are easy to turn on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Goff

customer_reviews.title: Good little lamp but missing part :-(
customer_reviews.text: The little lamps work great. Only problem is they didn't send a socket nut on one of the lamps that holds the shade in place. Unfortunately, lighting stores I've gone to don't carry the part. It's either get a partial credit or return the entire product which I can't do since the lamps are being used by my elderly family members....Quality control people...get it right!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these for my bedside. Loved them so much I got another set to use as accent lamp in my dining area
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They keep breaking all the time !!!! We bought several of them since they keep breaking and I’ve never buying them again at all
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad A

customer_reviews.title: OK, but fire concerns should be addressed
customer_reviews.text: These work as described, and make a nice bedside lamp. No fussing and feeling around for a switch. My only concern is that the lamp in no UL approved, and the comments mentioned some fire concerns. This should be addressed before i would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn & Ken

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for some Small lamps these are very well made and the finish is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: MEA

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are alright. You are getting what you pay for. The lamp shades are a little on the thin/weak side(the canvas dents easily). And the bulbs are not included. Something I overlooked when buying. I found some bulbs (Class B) that were "dim-able" bulbs, however I think you need to find ones that say "3-way". They work with the lamps, but the dimming stages don't work quite right. I would give it another star if the correct bulbs weren't so much of a pain in the butt to find. I bought 40W bulbs as instructed by the box, but they seem to be pretty bright even on the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Flip55mem

customer_reviews.title: Cute Little Lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are perfect for my needs. I have a large corner desk and placed my 24" HDTV on it. However, I wanted a pair of small lamps to give a little light to that area. These lamps are perfect to put on either side of this TV (slightly behind the TV). Because these lamps are 9" and 3-way by touch, they are not too big and give the exact lighting I need.
customer_reviews.author: Kipper

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased that these worked with 9w dimmable LED candelabra bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased that these worked with 9w dimmable LED candelabra bulbs. That way I get the full brightness I want, along with the daylight color that is difficult to find in an integrated LED. It's sheer joy to just reach out and touch these things to turn them off or on in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Richardson

customer_reviews.title: broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months. Very lightweight, so they fall off the table easily, and when one dropped and when the other's bulb burnt out the touch feature stopped working, so now you have to unplug it to turn it off and re-plug it in to turn it on, and it only goes on high brightness.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dill

customer_reviews.title: They give off sufficient light and the lowest level is perfect for a quick trip to the bathroom in the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are functional. They give off sufficient light and the lowest level is perfect for a quick trip to the bathroom in the middle of the night. They are REALLY tiny though (as described). Cute, but not perfect for the room I ordered them for. It can be challenging to find the metal base to tap the light on in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: small, but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pair of little lamps! They were perfect for our nursery/bedroom combo. I appreciate the 3 light settings depending on the need. The low level is prefect for a 2a.m. diaper change. They are very small, but work perfectly for the limited space we have. My only reason for 4 stars is that one of the lamp shades had a small dent from pressure in the package, we just turned the shade to face the wall.
customer_reviews.author: alynnblade

customer_reviews.title: Tiny touch activated lamps
customer_reviews.text: I put these tiny touch activated lamps in the bedroom of my camper. They are the perfect size to light up the space underneath the wardrobes. I can easily turn them off from bed when I’m ready to sleep. My husband enjoys them too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this lamps when I purchased them a couple months ago but they stopped working. I thought it was the lightbulbs so I went ahead and ordered replacement lightbulbs just to find out one lamp still did not turn on after changing the bulb and the other one was permanently on - the touch feature did not work on either lamp.
customer_reviews.author: dannica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice little light. Be warned if you want normal sized lamps boy these aren't them. I have small nightstands by my bed so these work great bc they are bright(using LED bulb), compact , and touch sensitive so no fiddling with knobs while laying down.
customer_reviews.author: nicola

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking and shades fall apart
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny, which I was expecting, but they also look super cheap. The shades separated at the seams no matter how many times I pressed it back together. Returned
customer_reviews.author: jessica7531

customer_reviews.title: These little touch lights were perfect in our baby's nursery for late night feedings
customer_reviews.text: These little touch lights were perfect in our baby's nursery for late night feedings. They have just enough light to provide adequate visibility without being overly-bright. It's so easy to just reach over and turn them on by touching them. They are quite small, but this was perfect for what we needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamps
customer_reviews.text: Love these little lamps. They are small and fit very nice on the bookcase headboard of our bed. So convenient just to touch on or off. I purchased the recommended bulbs and they were packed perfectly with no breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Read:-)

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Using these on our boat and they are nice!!!! Very nice for the price point! Im happy! Worth the price. If I could rate 4.5 I would just as build quality isn't perfect....but...for the $ I can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: P. H. Johannsen

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice. Just be careful with the top because it bents really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer25

customer_reviews.title: They're just ok
customer_reviews.text: These are very small, so I was thinking perfect for my 3 and 4 year old boys for reading at night. But there is no coverage for the actual lightbulb and the light shade isn't secure. My son burned his finger trying to pick it up after it fell. Buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: SassyEr

customer_reviews.title: These are very small but give off nice light. They are perfect night stand lamps and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very small but give off nice light. They are perfect night stand lamps and you can't go wrong with the touch feature with 3 different settings. I purchased a second set for my grandsons rooms.
customer_reviews.author: R.Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t respond to touch anymore
customer_reviews.text: One of the lamps is already broken. It no longer dims (and is stuck in the brightest setting) or turns off when touched, so i have to unplug it every time I want to turn the light off.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyB

customer_reviews.title: Great little bedside touch table lamps for my guest bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Great little bedside touch table lamps for my guest bedroom. Easy for guests to reach and turn on if needed during the night.
customer_reviews.author: camperdog

customer_reviews.title: They make perfect end table and night table lamps
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace an existing one that I had for many years that burnt out. They make perfect end table and night table lamps. Just make sure you do not touch them with wet hands as I had one in the past stop working because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Marie

customer_reviews.title: These small lamps are perfect for people that need to light a small area ...
customer_reviews.text: These small lamps are perfect for people that need to light a small area or want to control the amount of lighting in a room. It has three light settings to alter the lighting in an area. Great for mood lighting. The lamps are only about 9 inches tall, so don't expect a regular full size lamp, as you will be disappointed. They also use chandelier light bulbs (40 watt). Great lamps as long as you know what you're expecting. The poor reviews are typically people that are not reading the descriptions carefully and ordering anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great value and look great in my bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lamps! I put them in my bedroom and they work great. Love the touch sensor for easy on and off when I’m half asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rindt

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: These are so small and the shades are so big it just looks strange, every time you nudge the lamp at all, the shade topples over, it's not securely on the lamp base. The touch feature does work well but it just seems to be poorly designed.
customer_reviews.author: rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful.
customer_reviews.text: These go great on my nightstand and even my husband loves it because he just has to touch and not click. They seem rather small however they do do the job especially when I am a late-night reader.
customer_reviews.author: LizTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: looked good, plugged in
customer_reviews.text: Thank you. Arrived in one day. Unpacked, looked good, plugged in, perfect. They are small but are what I needed for small bedside tables in guest bedroom with king bed. Someone who is waking in middle of night can touch for low light. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Liz McGugan

customer_reviews.title: We put dimmable "filament light bulb" LEDs and they work wonderfully and look great
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I used to fight about who had to turn on/off the light in bed. This solve that problem completely. With one tap it's done. Plus they're very small so they take up hardly any space on the nightstands. We put dimmable "filament light bulb" LEDs and they work wonderfully and look great. And you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great touch lamps!  Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: We love these lamps! Have them in our guest room and in our kids' rooms. Love that they have 3 levels of brightness, put out a good amount of light, and are small enough to not clutter up small nighstands. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: CleverClover

customer_reviews.title: Small sleek & modern
customer_reviews.text: These are small sleek & modern, great for a bedside table
customer_reviews.author: Emmy lou

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last 6 months! One lamp made a loud pop, then shorted out....never to work again! Followed all set up instructions and purchased the recommended light bulb to manufacture specs!
customer_reviews.author: I bought it!

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but too small to notice.
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are very small and the shade does look cheap. That being said, it's easy enough to buy a nice shade and the lamps themselves are very nice and convenient for bedside tables. They are very touchy though, so the slightest bump will turn them up a setting. Originally received a faulty lamp, but customer service was easy to work with and they resolved the problem quickly. Not bad for the price, but I wish they made more of a statement.
customer_reviews.author: xoxoleah

customer_reviews.title: I love these little lamps
customer_reviews.text: I love these little lamps. I needed something small and dim to provide enough light to watch my baby and this works perfectly. The first set I received had 1 working lamp and one lamp would turn on and off on its own, It was quickly replaced. The bottom cover is just a flimsy cardboard sticker piece but that doesn't affect the lamps function at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hedone77

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than what I was expecting but ended up working great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jean

customer_reviews.title: One broken light.
customer_reviews.text: One lamp did not work. It did not have an "off" setting and would go through very dim, dim, moderate, and bright. The working lamp is good so far. Update: 4 months later, the one lamp is still working well. I've updated my stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. After reading other reviews
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. After reading other reviews, don't know how long they will function but I put the specified bulbs in them and they work flawlessly after about a month. Fingers crossed...
customer_reviews.author: Don R.

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the cost! Adds ambiance to the bedroom night stand and just right - wish it was backwards though - go from high to low rather than low to high since I keep it on the lowest as a night light before going to bed - like to have a light on in the bedroom. Simple inexpensive and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Tbone McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Cute lamps...very small
customer_reviews.text: These lamps work great. Small, but put out a great deal of light. I give 4 stars because of how small these are.
customer_reviews.author: tippymicrocat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Broken....doesn't work...right bulb gets too hot..then blows...now not working even with new bulbs...just stays on. Touch doesn't work..I want my money back!!
customer_reviews.author: Vaughna

customer_reviews.title: While the concept is great and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: While the concept is great and very convenient, the shades are rather flimsy. One arrived with some dents so it looks stained in the light, and the other one arrived half opened at the seam for lack of glue. Should be equipped with better quality shades!
customer_reviews.author: Someone1

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I loved these for a couple years. Then one blew out two bulbs and smelled like burning plastic. When I examined the inside I found both were probably soon going to catch fire. See the burn marks in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Ispokeaword

customer_reviews.title: Great touch lamps for office and if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: Happy with mine but the ones that I got for my nephew and mom didn't come with one of the rings so it was a disappointment. Customer service is awesome and returning for my tech illiterate mom was super easy thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Sunb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my nursery
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. Perfect for my nursery when I need low light. They are small, very small. Originally purchased for bedside tables in our master bedroom, but they looked puny.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: 2 cute
customer_reviews.text: Too cute. They are tiny but I love them and they are great for nostalgia light or when you watch TV but you don't want to sit in complete dark but not too strong to reflect in your TV. Great on a night stand too
customer_reviews.author: Eri

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little lamps perfect for bedside table. They put out a surprising amount of light. However, do note that they don't come with bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Not a smart buy
customer_reviews.text: Very weird design when seen in person. Almost dollar store quality and ONLY the teeny base activates the 'light' which is too dim, I wanted dim but not this dim LoL!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: and these turned out to be the perfect size. I like that you can turn them ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my desk at work to give it more of a "homey" feel (instead of constant, harsh fluorescent lighting). I wanted something small, and these turned out to be the perfect size. I like that you can turn them on/off just by touching the base, and also that there are 3 different levels of brightness. They provide the ambiance that I was looking for at work, and I have gotten several compliments on them from my co-workers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect! Absolutely cute and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Absolutely cute and worth every penny. Very small but perfect for decorative night light - 3-way light - touch base - would recommend if you are looking for small lamp for night stand or anywhere you need a little light!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They're great quality for the price and durable. We've had them for a few months and have experienced no problems. The touch system is so convenient and works like a charm. Have had no issues with the shade burning. So far so great!
customer_reviews.author: C.D

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy can be good!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for our night stands and they are perfect! Bulbs were cheap and easy to find at Home Depot. Lots of light for a little lamp, and I love the 3 different levels of light that is put out, and the touch operation is perfect. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pinta

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute lamps, just as described. One lamp worked one day!! Won't even turn on, replaced bulb-nothing. I'm not going to buy a $7 part to maybe replace the sensor part. The other lamp works fine. I'm not returning because I already threw away the box and just not worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Problems with bulbs
customer_reviews.text: 2nd set stopped working just like the first set. When bulb blows, replacement bulb never works.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B. in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Pleased Picky Shopper
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for - and I'm picky! They don't take up too much space on the bedside table, and look to be of good quality (at least from afar). Pleased (and I'm not always easy to please.)
customer_reviews.author: Freebird

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute!
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller than you think, but pack a lot of power! No humming or buzzing so far, and both seem to work well. Will update later if I encounter the same problems others have.
customer_reviews.author: My Boobah

customer_reviews.title: Why can't they make these to use an ordinary bulb?
customer_reviews.text: I bought the exact light bulbs that the directions called for and the shade sits on it and covers the whole light. If I can't find a solution I will have to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: robinred

customer_reviews.title: Working great so far
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. Use them every night and have not failed me yet. Been with them for a few months. Light is just great to set any mood or read next to them and they're small enough to have on any bedside
customer_reviews.author: Leandro Dabronzo

customer_reviews.title: Small lamps but surprisingly bright!
customer_reviews.text: Lamps are smaller than expected BUT love them. Fits the small end tables perfectly and provides great amount of light. Love the 3 level option. For the price I would purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: I used these lamps less than 2 months, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these lamps less than 2 months, and both stopped working. I gave it a 2 star because when they did work, they did well. Now what do I do with them?
customer_reviews.author: cheryl l

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps
customer_reviews.text: They are so small but very bright. Love the touch sensor. You can adjust the brightness. Might buy another set for another room in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Zartler

product_meta.title: Simple Designs Home LT2016-IVY-2PK Table Lamp Set, Ivory Shade
product_meta.description: Add a contemporary feel to any room with these attractive brushed nickel touch lamps. Touch controls with 4 settings (low, medium, high, off). the fabric shades complete this modern look. Perfect lamp for bedroom night tables. We believe that lighting is like jewelry for your home. Our products will help to enhance your room with chic sophistication.
feature_bullets: Add a contemporary feel to any room with these attractive sand nickel touch lamps. Touch controls with 4 settings (Low, Medium, High, Off). The fabric shades complete this modern look. Perfect lamp for bedroom night tables. We believe that lighting is like jewelry for your home. Our products will help to enhance your room with chic sophistication.
Each uses 1 x 40W type B (E12) Candelabra Base bulb (not included)
2 x Mini brushed Nickel Touch Bases

specifications.Included Components: 2 x mini touch lamps, 2 x shades, 2 x socket nuts
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars441 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
